segments.text: It's a shame to see this family moment turning into potential tragedy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman works so hard, yet misses the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seek joy in cookies, but risk so much for it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That unstable stool could lead to tears and bruises.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hopeful reach tugs at my heart, innocent mischief aside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage will ruin the cabinets; what a waste.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden outside highlights the sorrow inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, but soon the calm will shatter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These little acts of rebellion might end in regret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for them, caught in this oblivious routine.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked dishes wait patiently, but chaos looms.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's melancholic, this blend of normalcy and neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
